Version notice:

Bot StandardÂ¶

As part of the Web Application Firewall policy that we have previously deployed the Bot Standard protection is enabled. This capability clasiffies bots based on the user agent request.

The default configuration will behave as bellow.

Object Value
Malicious Bot Block
Suspicious Bot Report
Good Bot Report

Suspicious Bot is clasified based non-malicious tools detection like curl.

We will change the Suspicious Bot to blocking.
